level.text: The Director may cancel all or part of a public space permit issued pursuant to this chapter at any time and require the intercity bus service operator to vacate all or part of the public space it is occupying if the Director determines the public space is required to meet District transportation or public space needs.

The Director shall provide written notice to the intercity bus service operator at the operator’s last address of record at least thirty (30) days before the cancellation of a permit under this section.

If the Director requires the intercity bus service operator to vacate all or part of any public space occupied pursuant to a public space permit, the Director shall refund the percentage of the annual public space permit fee proportional to the amount of space so vacated and the length of time remaining in the year for which the permit fee was paid.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 5323, 5333 (June 24, 2011).
